name: CleaningBot
description:
Control this robot vacuum to remove the filth from these rooms and move on! Note: The volume for the tutorial is too loud. Please adjust your volume down before selecting the tutorial button in the main menu This game is a solo effort. I built this game in order to learn various things about the tool and grow my capabilities as a game dev. This game is free for all players, there is a Windows and Mac build available. Feedback is appreciated.

Game Features:

- Automatic progress saving, can jump into any room previously reached from start menu

- User can set and save options found in the options menu

- Game works with keyboard input as well as game pad. See Options menu for button control layout
